# Mad Tiger Spirit

## Mad Tiger Location

* The final location is back in the area where you fought the Earth Wolf and rescued the Horse Guai who was tied up by the large statue in Sandgate Village. Look to the left of that statue altar, and you’ll find a small field around the back with a concerning amount of skeletons and a well.
img_below_text: Using the Rattle-Drum here one final time will cause the spirit of the boy to appear before you, and invite you to hop down the well to meet a “friend”. Unfortunately, if the dull echoing roars coming from somewhere below are any indication, you’re not going to meet a friendly face down there.
